entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High 10 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers and flurries ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 10 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 2 or low.
